In the class org.apache.log4j.spi.LocationInfo there is a static property 
inVisualAge which is initialized for each new instance, because the 
initializer method doesn' have is not static method 

When using log4j in an applet, this means that for each time an output has to 
be generated the Applet Class Loader goes to the Server to try to load this 
class. This decreases the performance a lot.

Solution. Just add the static method access modifier to the initializing method
creator: Hein.Couwet@mediamine.com
